TopicTitle: 64 bit windows random crash inside VAB

Articles.Content:
I'm having a strange issue here, KSP crashes without any debug info and no trace in the log when I am doing stuff in VAB. It goes simply like ksp.exe stopped working.

Here's a mod list:

Post your output_log.txt. Its found under KSP_x64_Data. I suspect you're a victim of the random crashes that are currently plaguing the game and are receiving criminally little attention. (an unpredictable CTD should be at the top priority of everyone at SQUAD, and here)

I believe squad is still on their 2 week break after releasing the last patch (why have a break after a patch, which nearly always needs hot-fixing we dont know). Have another few days before they return & realise the issue I suspect

Same here, frequent crashes inside VAB, I would say considerably more than in 1.05. Plus old bugs with fuel tanks going kuku when copied to x8.

And would say game is a bit slower when loading assets
